Package edu.upenn.cis.pdtb.xpath

XPath support for PDTB.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CachedAbsolutePathFunction Caching subexpressions.
CompareSpanListFunction Generic SpanList comparisons.
DelimTextFunction Transforms the raw text into delimited blocks, one for each span.
IsAdverbialFunction Filter for adverbial connectives.
IsArgFunction Checks if the context node is an argument.
IsCoordConjFunction Filter for subordinating conjunctions.
IsRelationFunction Checks if the context node is a relation.
IsSubConjFunction Filter for subordinating conjunctions.
IsSupFunction Checks if the context node is supplementary information.
PDTBNavigator This interfaces with the Jaxen XPath API.
PDTBXPath A simple top level query interface to the PDTB.
RegexpFunction Regular Expressions.
SpanListSizeFunction Returns the size of the SpanList associated with the context node.
 

Package edu.upenn.cis.pdtb.xpath Description
